name: Basement Lab
longDesc: You are in the basement lab for the first time. To the west, a hatch leads up and out to the backyard. It is the only real exit. On the northern wall, in the corner to the east, there is a laundry chute which opens up to a laundry basket. You cannot climb up it, but you can slide down it if you know where the entrance is. There is a desk on the south wall, with a computer and a big, old fashioned, keyboard. You need a password to access the computer. The computer has the software for the shrink gun.
description: You are in the basement lab. To the west, a hatch leads up and out to the backyard. It is the only real exit. On the northern wall, in the corner to the east, there is a laundry chute which opens up to a laundry basket. You cannot climb up it, but you can slide down it if you know where the entrance is.

laundryChute.name: laundryChute
laundryChute.description: This leads up to your bedroom, but you can't climb up it, you can only slide down it.

desk.name: desk
desk.description: The computer is on the desk, you need to climb the desk to get to it

computer.name: computer
computer.description: You need to enter a password to access the software to make the shrink ray reverse
computer.discoveryStatment: Welcome, here's that software you wanted.

growRaySoftware.name: growRaySoftware
growRaySoftware.description: Hidden until you enter the computer password
